definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

pinyin: sui3 guo4 yang3 hua4 wu4 mei2

sentences.english: Buy vehicles with low NOX emissions, and maintain all vehicles well.
sentences.chinese: 購買少產生氮氧化物的汽車，保持汽車的良好狀態。

sentences.english: An impure oxide of cobalt, used to produce a blue color in enamel and in the making of smalt.
sentences.chinese: 淺的綠藍色顏料，主要由鈷和錫的氧化物組成。

sentences.english: Hydroxides include the familiar alkalies of laboratory and industrial processes.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧化物包括實驗室和工業過程中常用的鹼。

sentences.english: The IDC has a more uniform work function distribution than an oxide cathode.
sentences.chinese: 氧化物陰極的逸出功分佈比鋇鎢陰極更不均勻。

sentences.english: Therefore, formation of high valance vanadium oxide films was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 因此，形成價態更高的釩氧化物薄膜。

sentences.english: Superoxide dismutase activity in testicular tissue.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸組織中超氧化物歧化酶的活性。

sentences.english: However hydroxyl has no effect on carbon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 但是，氫氧化物卻對二氧化碳毫無影響。

sentences.english: The oxygen-sensitive characters of metal-oxide semiconductor oxygen sensor is re-ported.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種氧化物半導體型氧敏元件的氧敏特性。

sentences.english: Tsui welding is easy to clean up oxides and not a bad solder Tsui.
sentences.chinese: 容易清潔焊咀上的氧化物而不會壞焊咀。

sentences.english: High performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) made by atmospheric plasma spraying (APS …
sentences.chinese: 一種固體氧化物燃料電池封嚴技術塗層應用發展。

sentences.english: Insulin was labeled with horseradish peroxidase by sodium periodate oxidation method.
sentences.chinese: 用高碘酸鈉氧化法將辣根過氧化物酶標記於胰島素。

sentences.english: Presently, Peroxidase is employed as indicator for blanching treatments of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 目前蔬菜的熱燙終點以過氧化物酶作爲指示劑來確定。

sentences.english: The fibre diameter increases with increasing fluidity of the molten oxide .
sentences.chinese: 熔融氧化物的流化度增大，纖維直徑增大。

sentences.english: Process of making lustre glaze by metal oxide as colouring agent was narrated.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了以金屬氧化物爲着色劑的虹彩釉的製作過程。

sentences.english: It occurs chiefly as the dioxide (stannic oxide, SnO2) in cassiterite.
sentences.chinese: 主要以氧化物狀態存在。

sentences.english: The existence of Fe203can enhance the utilization ratio of sulfur retention additive.
sentences.chinese: 鐵系氧化物的加入能明顯提高固硫劑的利用率。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)
